item.title: Using Kotlin Type Aliases To Automate Microservice Integration
item.description: We are very excited to welcome Marty Pitt from Orbital. He will be giving a talk on Using Kotlin Type Aliases To Automate Microservice Integration As teams embrace microservices, and the number of APIs, Topics and DBs explode, integration can become time-consuming to build, and a maintenance nightmare. This talk explores using semantic metadata (powered by Kotlin type aliases) to automate integration between all your APIs, Message queues, serverless functions and more.
